name: AgainAndAgain
description:
A slime... Just a tiny helpless creature, jumping around aimlessly. What does it live for? Is there even a point, a meaning, a destination? Maybe this slime is different...

Well, it is not. It's just an ordinary stupid slime.  It can not even fulfill its needs, that's why it can die literally in any second of its tiny life. The only thing it lives for is the light, which brings joy and motivation to find its purpose in this cruel universe. That is its hunt...the light... The light spheres.

Controls: 

- Arrows or WASD - move around
- Space - jump off the wall OR stick to the ceiling

Credits: 

- Revelcoo
- Blood's Tears
- CheChelovechina
- Vladithur

Commonly asked questions:

- Wait, is it just another platformer?
- Yes.
